quote.author: Jim Rohn
quote.saying: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present

quote.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi
quote.saying: Happiness radiates like the fragrance from a flower and draws all good things towards you

quote.author: Frankiln D. Roosevelt
quote.saying: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort

quote.author: Carol Burnett
quote.saying: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me

quote.author: Unknown
quote.saying: The past cannot be chnaged. The future is yet in your power
